MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Putra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Welp, that's all folks!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Minato Yanagase
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Amazing, you beat the monster in no time...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Putra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: You okay?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Minato Yanagase
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Y-yes... Thank you for the danger part.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Luna Sakurakouji
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Thank you, that was really brilliantly done.
Yeah, I know this feeling. It's like being
saved by someone who has much higher levels than you in an online game...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Yoshino
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ooooh? Putra, are these two...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Putra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Ah, that's right.
They're the people from another world Paddington told us about!
We left the tundra fields and came to the Eisengrad base.
We were waiting for new information about Asahi's and Risona's friends.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Vivienne
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Heh, so you girls attend the Filia Girl's Academy,
is it a dressmaking school?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Yes, Jean... er,
a famous young designer in our world founded this school.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Vivienne
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: That's wonderful. So Asahi and Risona design too?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yes, although I am still studying.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Are you a fashionista yourself, Vivienne?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Vivienne
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Oui, I am. I'm considered the fashion leader of the SSS.
I'm also a sucker for pretty clothes, accessories and perfume.
I was a bit concerned that the atmosphere would be gloomy while we were waiting,
but it seems I worried too much. I'm relived that the conversation is going well.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I'm curious... about this otherworld's outfits...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I'm interested too.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Vivienne
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ah, really? Would you like to take a look at mine?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Wow, are you sure?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Vivienne
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Oui, I've packed a few sets of clothes on the train...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Paddington
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Everyone, I have good news!
Paddington, is that what I think it is?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Paddington
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Yes, Conductor!
I have been informed by Putra and Yoshino that
they've secured what appears to be your companions safely in Flamarine!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: R-Really?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Is it really Luna-chomu and Minaton this time?

Right, let's head on to Flamarine regardless.
Paddington, let's prepare.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Paddington
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Roger that! I'll get ready as soon as possible!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Yoshino
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ooooh-, so Luna goes to a clothing school.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Luna Sakurakouji
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yeah, that's right. I study in Filia Girl's Academy.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Yoshino
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yoshino is a seamstress, so is very interested in Luna's school.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Luna Sakurakouji
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Seamstress... Is that so?
Hmm, I'm interested in the clothes you make.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Minato Yanagase
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Amazing, this child. Even though it's the first time they've met,
she's already opened up Luna. This is quite a rare sight.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Putra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Really? 
Minato is... you kind of look like a person that can get along with anyone!!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Minato Yanagase
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ahaha. That line's exactly what I'm going to return right back atcha.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Putra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: My, we're a bit alike, aren't we?
\uWe're on the same wavelength, you know? I think we're gonna get along♪

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Minato Yanagase
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Is this person going to pick me up now, the Conductor? I wish I could get along with people like that!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Yoshino
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yoshino might want to go too, a clothes school.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Luna Sakurakouji
Minato Yanagase
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
H-Hold up, Luna,
don't say something so ominous... Muh gosh.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Putra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ahaha, don't worry. Luna and Minato,
and of course your other friends will be able to return to your home world!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Yoshino
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: That's riiight. Look, they're here to pick you up.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Minato Yanagase
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Woah, a train! It's looks so powerful!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Lady Luna, Minato!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: We finally met...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Luna Sakurakouji
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Asahi, Risona...
Glad you are safe, really...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Minato Yanagase
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yuuchooooooo-, Risonaaaaa-! Wuaaaauuugh-!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Paddington
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Looks like it's an emotional reunion, Conductor.
I'm so glad they're all so happy!

そYes, it's a joyous feeling too.
All that remains is to return the girls to their world and --
Suddenly, a great shock staggered our footing.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Yakutsk
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Mist Monsters! And that thing is...
Behind the Mist Monsters that has appeared,
was someone standing as if she's leading the monsters.
She appears to be wearing similar clothing to Luna's group.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Queensway
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: That's... Sir Conductor, that's the Mist Monster that attacked Asahi's group in the tundra!

A mysterious enemy and Mist Monsters are coming towards us.
No doubt, they intend to attack us. 
Then - we have no choice but to intercept them.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Queensway
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: HAH!
Queensway's blow slaughtered the Mist Monsters.
Each one is not so formidable,
and the battle is developing in our favour--

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Yakutsk
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: There are more of them... We still have to destroy the source.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Putra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: This is endless.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Yoshino
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Don't think it's good enough to just fight them.
The mysterious enemy wearing a girl's academy uniform...
She's probably attracting other Mist Monsters.
In other words, if that thing is not defeated, the situation will not cease...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Vivienne
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: That enemy isn't affected by our attacks!
You're right. No matter how hard we attacked,
she didn't seem to be taking any damage.
So what are we supposed to do--

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Everyone...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: It'll be okay, right...?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Minato Yanagase
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: D-Don't lose!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Luna Sakurakouji
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: We can only just stand and watch this... It's so frustrating.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: If we were able to help in any way--

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Luna Sakurakouji
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Wh-What's going on...?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Hey, Luna-chomu, why are you glowing?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Minato Yanagase
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
No, you don't mean to say, Luna...
You brought 'that' along, didn't you!?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Is that... Lady Luna, what's going on?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Luna Sakurakouji
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I didn't forget about... Just that I didn't have the time to tell you.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: The mirror...!?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
That was the mirror of the mist...
Wasn't it? Why do you have this, Luna-chomu?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Luna Sakurakouji
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: When we first noticed it on our world, it had fallen right next to me here.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Minato Yanagase
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: It's glowing really brightly... Is it gonna explode or something?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: It's just like when we were sent away...!
The light emitted from the fog mirror gradually intensifies.
Eventually it was so bright until nobody could keep their eyes open--
Risona, Luna, and Minato, the three of them are enveloped within.
